But allah ne inhe khud se alag kar ke rakhne ke liye nahi kaha he inko bhi izzat deni hi he hame q k ye bhi hamari hi tarha sirf our sirf insaan he. Ye koi bimaar ya inse nazre churane jese nai he . Balke ye banane ke time ho gai ek choti si galti he ek nuks he bas. Jese koi per se maazur peda hota he. Koi haath se to koi zuban se to koi aankhse to koi sunne ki taqat se. to wesa hi ye bhi ek pedaaishi nuks he maazuri he bas. To kya ham aese peda hue baccho ko apnate nai apnate hena wese hi ye bhi insaan he jinka badan ka bas ek hissa pura nai hota but inhe bhi ham me hi jaga our izzat ka darja dena ye hukm he allah our uske rasul ka. Per ye baat rahi sirf pedaaishi khusro ki jinki niche ki body incomplete hoti he our badan aadmi ka pr fitrat aurat ki. pr jo log complete body le ke peda hue he but ander se kuch our mehsoos karte he unko chahiye ke wo allah ke aage na jaaye our uski diibhui zindagi ko khushi se accept kare our jaayez tarike se jiye. Taake wo unko us ka sila marne ke baad direct ham normal logose bhi pehle de heaven ke rup me na ke uski qudrat se chhed chaad kar ke usko challeng kare. Allah ko aesa log bilkul pasand nahi to plzzzz mere bhai bheno jo bhi aesa feel karte he our inme se kam az kam jo bhi meri baato ko apne allah our apne bhagwaan ke waaste samjh rahe he wo plzzz samjhe our allah ko naaraaz na kare bas uske fesle ko qubul kare. Q k uske aage ham khud bhi khud ke nahi. Ham sab uper waale ki amanat he to uski amanat me khayanat na kare. Aage aaplog jesi marzi our plzzz mujhe bura mat samjhna na bura kehna na baddua dena koi. Bas me  apne uper waale ka jo hukum he wo aaplog tak pohchana chahti thi. Yaha mera kaam khatam aage aap apne bhale khud he sab kuch ye duniya hi nai hoti uper bhi jaana he.
